types.name: Button
types.summary: A clickable rectangle that fires an event when clicked. Represented by an A element in most CSS frameworks.

types.name: HtmlControl
types.summary: A special control used for building custom controls from HTML elements from the SharpJS.Dom namespace.

types.name: ImageView
types.summary: An ImageView displays an image. This is represented by an IMG tag in HTML.

types.name: LinkLabel
types.summary: A link label is very similar to a label; however, it usually has a hyperlink destination.

types.name: Panel
types.summary: A control made specifically for grouping other controls. You can hide all the controls inside the panel by hiding the panel.

types.name: PreformattedTextBlock
types.summary: A preformatted text block represented by a PRE element in HTML

types.name: TextArea
types.summary: A control with a multi-line textbox. Is represented by a TEXTAREA tag in HTML.

types.name: TextBlock
types.summary: One of the most basic controls, representing a block of text. Represented by a paragraph tag in HTML.

types.name: TextBox
types.summary: A box that a user can enter text into.

types.name: TextControl
types.summary: The base class for controls that consist of text, allowing easy customization of font on inheriting controls.

types.name: WebView
types.summary: A control that can render an HTML document from source or a URI. This element is represented by an IFRAME tag
